meanings.definition: The act of committing robbery or banditry.
meanings.sent1: The dacoity in the village left everyone scared.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the gang responsible for the dacoity.
meanings.sent3: The dacoity at the costume party was just a playful act.
meanings.sent4: The dacoity of time steals away our youth.
meanings.sent5: The dacoity of the pirates was depicted vividly in the movie.

meanings.definition: A group of people engaged in committing robbery or banditry.
meanings.sent1: Witnesses saw the dacoity group fleeing the scene.
meanings.sent2: The dacoity was well-organized and executed with precision.
meanings.sent3: The dacoity of squirrels stealing nuts amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The dacoity of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The dacoity of the thieves was foiled by the vigilant neighbors.
